text: Ignez Magdalena Aranha de Lima "Inezita" Barroso (4 March 1925 – 8 March 2015), was a Brazilian sertanejo singer, guitarist, actress, TV presenter, librarian, folklorist and teacher. In 1953 and 1955 she was awarded with Prêmio Saci. Barroso died of a long illness in São Paulo, Brazil, aged 90. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Singers from São Paulo Category:Brazilian guitarists Category:Brazilian television presenters Category:Brazilian educators Category:Actors from São Paulo Category:Musicians from São Paulo
title: Inezita Barroso
